description:
What is Wordpress ? 

WordPress is an online, open source blog and website creation tool written in PHP , MySQL. It’s probably the easiest and most powerful blogging and website content management system (or CMS) in existence today.

Many famous blogs, news outlets, music sites, Fortune 500 companies and celebrities are using WordPress.

About the Course

Wordpress Basic to Advanced Tutorial was designed to teach anyone from noobs to advanced users on how to use Free Open Source Tool - Wordpress. You can create amazing and professional looking websites with the help of tons and tons of Themes available online.This course operates under the assumption that the student knows nothing about wordpress, or building websites for that matter.

This course is a complete course for anyone, no matter what your technical ability. This course assumes no prior knowledge!

We will start from the beginning by choosing the Domain Name , Web Hosting and How to link them together.
title: Wordpress Basic to Advanced Tutorials
